sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour"> <x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>Divya_M</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-03-28 05:20:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5c3b80be4f811b0053c240f18110c707</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>Divya_M</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-03-28 05:21:21</sys_updated_on> <u_content>Looking for some important announcements like Outage/News within the organization, here is the list to throw some emergency information for you</u_content> <u_order>6</u_order> <u_placement>top</u_placement> <u_target>esm-top-news</u_target> <u_title>Announcements</u_title> </x_infte_esm_servic_esm_guided_tour> </record_update>
